ygData.subject: Re: Trading at the Bazaar.
ygData.msgSnippet: Morning, You need to stand under one of the many stalls and do the /trader command. It pops up a new window showing the contents of your trader satchel. From
ygData.messageBody:
Morning,

You need to stand under one of the many stalls and do the /trader
command. It pops up a new window showing the contents of your trader
satchel. From there you can set prices for items and click "begin
trader" to start selling things.

Ciao,
Andrew

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Edward Fox" <edward001@c...> wrote:
> Ok. I have my traders satchel. I have goods in the satchel. I'm in
> the Bazaar. Now how do I start the trading? Do I have to become a
> trader? How do I do that if so? I'm still learning but I'm enjoying
> the game even so.
>
> Edward Fox
